parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It promotes a high school program organized by Mathias Corvinus Collegium.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and aims to reach a wide audience interested in high school programs in Transylvania.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote a high school program, not to influence the vote for any candidate in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post could be considered a form of advertisement, it does not fall under journalistic standards. It's an advertisement for an educational program.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3867690476805249</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes a high school program offered by Mathias Corvinus Collegium.  The content focuses solely on the program's details, application deadlines, and benefits for students. There is no mention of any political candidate, party, or any attempt to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections. The post targets a broad audience interested in education, not specifically voters.  Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>MCC</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
